title: Bad Piggies 3D Models
author: Jacob McGowan
description: High-quality 3D models of Bad Piggies characters and vehicles for your game projects.

title: Development Textures
author: Jacob McGowan
description: Essential texture pack for rapid prototyping and development, including grids, patterns, and placeholder materials.

title: Sample 3rd Person Controller Unity Package
author: Jacob McGowan
description: Complete Unity package with a customizable third-person character controller, including movement, camera, and animation systems.
